DOC.brief_title: Combining Antidepressant Medication Psychotherapy Insomnia Improve Depression Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: Difficulties fall and/or stay asleep common people suffer depression . Persistent insomnia hinder response treatment . In addition , individual whose insomnia resolve standard antidepressant therapy increase risk recurrence depression . Between 60 % 84 % people major depressive disorder report symptom insomnia . This study assess efficacy combine antidepressant medication sleep-focused psychotherapy simultaneously treat sleep difficulty depression . Participants double-blind study randomly assign receive either desensitization therapy cognitive behavioral therapy target insomnia . All participant also receive escitalopram oxalate , antidepressant medication . The study last 12 week . The severity participant ' depression insomnia assess . Study visit occur weekly first 6 week , bi-weekly last 6 week , 6 month post-intervention .
